body_html: @goldsborough @SsnL .Thanks a lot for your suggestions. I will try. It seems that if I use c++ extension, I don't need to compile .cu file separately. If I use c extension with cffi, the .cu file need to be compiled separately and the object file need to be added into ffi extra_objects. Am I right?

body: @goldsborough @SsnL .Thanks a lot for your suggestions. I will try. It seems that if I use c++ extension, I don't need to compile .cu file separately. If I use c extension with cffi, the .cu file need to be compiled separately and the object file need to be added into ffi extra_objects. Am I right?
